dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Policy
Enforcement
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2006 9:27 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Sony Television Letter to ISP (02 14 06)
Date:         Thu, 20 Apr 2006 10:10:50 -0400
From:         Jayme <jayme@netenforcers.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>





*April 20, 2006*

*SENT VIA Certified Mail
  Return Receipt Requested*

        

*7005 3110 0000 6651 7871*



* *

*Designated Agent*

*Thplanet.com*



*/Re:      Unauthorized Use of Sony Trademarks and/or Copyrighted
Materials/*



Dear Designated Agent:



We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you with
respect to unauthorized use of Sony?s trademarks and/or copyrighted materials.



Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its
rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials.
 Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17
U.S.C.
